info.name: Account (Buyer Side)
info.description:
To use Account service you need to have:

1. Adform Agency account.

2. User account (with enabled External API module). 

HIGHLY IMPORTANT: External API module gives authorisation to use API services.

In case it's your first time using our services, please contact our Adform Traffic: traffic@adform.com or Adform Help:help@adform.com teams for assistance.

exec: tests["Ticket was set as a global variable"] =

request.description:
This request allows you to get authentication token that can then be used to access all other Adform API services.

The token itself has a total lifetime of 24 hours and expires after 3 hours of inactivity.

Authentication token is set as a global 'Ticket' variable and it can be reused in further requests - headers and json body.

If you want to use global variables please write them in double curly brackets: {{Ticket}}

Request body fields:
1. UserName - mandatory
2. Password - mandatory

This method returns a list of all users which are under the same client as you have logged in.

Currently no filtering is enabled.
